genresAdvancedInfo.name: salon music
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Salon music is a genre of music that became popular in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. It is characterized by its elegant and refined style, often played in intimate settings such as salons or small concert halls. Salon music is typically performed by small ensembles and features classical and folk-inspired melodies, with a focus on virtuosic instrumental performances.
